edu.biu.scapi.primitives.randomOracle

Class HashBasedRO

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.biu.scapi.primitives.randomOracle.HashBasedRO
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RandomOracle

    public class HashBasedRO
extends java.lang.Object
implements RandomOracle
    Concrete class of random oracle based on CryptographicHash.
    Author:
    Cryptography and Computer Security Research Group Department of Computer Science Bar-Ilan University (Moriya Farbstein)

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      HashBasedRO()
      default constructor that sets default values to the underlying cryptographic hash.

      Constructor that gets a cryptographic hash object and sets it to the class member.
      HashBasedRO(java.lang.String hashName)
      Constructor that gets a cryptographic hash name, creates the corresponding object and sets it to the class member.

        Computes the random oracle function on the given input.
        Specified by:
        compute in interface RandomOracle
        Parameters:
        input - input to compute the random oracle function on.
        inOffset - offset within the input to take the bytes from.
        inLen - length of the input.
        outLen - required output length in BYTES.
        Returns:
        a string in the required length.
